course_description: Focusing on the history and legacy of National Socialism in Germany and occupied Europe, this course will analyze how fascism and film developed in tandem since the First World War, and how film has subsequently shaped the way that both fascism and anti-fascism are understood and remembered.
schedule_location:
TTh 2:30pm-3:45pm in Modern Language 201
M 7pm-9pm in White Hall 102
